featured_reviews.review_id:
First and foremost, your customer service was outstanding. Scheduling the appointment was effortless, and your team was punctual, arriving right on time. They were not only professional but also friendly, making me feel comfortable entrusting them with my home.

The cleaning results were truly impressive. My carpets have never looked better, and the attention to detail throughout the house was remarkable. It's evident that your team takes pride in their work, as every nook and cranny was thoroughly cleaned. The freshness and cleanliness of my home after your visit were simply unparalleled.

Moreover, your commitment to using eco-friendly and safe cleaning products resonated with me. Knowing that my family and pets were not exposed to harmful chemicals while achieving such fantastic results is a significant peace of mind.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Dhruv,

Thank you for taking the time to leave such a detailed and glowing review of our services! We're thrilled to hear that you had a positive experience with Sweepy Maids.

It's wonderful to know that you found our customer service outstanding and that our team's punctuality and friendliness made you feel comfortable. We take pride in delivering impressive results, especially in carpet cleaning and attention to detail.

featured_reviews.review_id:

I would definitely recommend Sweepy Maids.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Their team is amazing and so responsive. A tenant moved out and I was suppose to move in the following day. The house needed a cleaning before I moved in. The day I called Sweepy maids, they booked me through for the same day.
Their team cleaned every bit and piece of the household, it was a thorough deep cleaning in and out of my 2 bedroom apartment. Every appliance, the smallest of the knob or switches were cleaned with great care.
The team carried out the cleaning, as though it's their own home. I am so glad I booked Sweepy maids Vancouver.
My apartment is brand new now and a great thanks to this affectionate team. They made sure, I am well satisfied with their cleaning. They stayed a little extra and made sure everything was perfectly cleaned.
They made sure, not a single hair or dust particle remains on the walls or floor. My carpets were washed well twice to make sure all corners go nice and clean.
Professional service with great team. I  recommend this to all. They are my to go cleaning service of all times from now on.
Thank you so much Sweepy Maids!!!!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Jarif Mayat, for your wonderful review and for trusting Sweepy Maids with your cleaning needs! We're thrilled that our responsive and professional team provided you with a thorough deep cleaning experience for your 2-bedroom apartment in Vancouver. Our goal is to ensure every corner sparkles, and we're glad you noticed the attention to detail. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we're honored to be your go-to cleaning service in Vancouver.
